about_the_game:
Dragon Title

Is deck builder with Bullet Hell style combat.
It includes classic JRPG campaign and Roguelike mode!

Deck Building!

Craft your deck with an array of unique cards, each representing an action or an ability. Ranging from drinking lube to restore your HP or applying percussive seduction techniques to the head of the opposing waifoe.

Bullet hell!

Pass the turn and brace yourself for a relentless barrage of attacks in active dodging minigame.

Aftermath of the battle

Combat in Dragon Title is really just very elaborate mating ritual.
And after successful display of mating eligibility of course comes the actual mating.
Play your cards right and you just might get the girl. Any girl. All waifoes in the game can be convinced to play with your di... deck.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains partial, full nudity and explicit sex.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you can run other games on Steam, it's probably OK
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Processor: 3GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you can run other games on Steam, it's probably OK
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
